revision.description: admin@192.168.100.100 (Local Database): Configuration changed via the wizard subsystem.

package.name: FRR
package.descr: FRR routing daemon for BGP, OSPF, OSPF6 and RIP.<br /> <strong>Conflicts with Quagga OSPF and OpenBGPD; these packages cannot be installed at the same time.</strong>

item.descr: Maximum socket buffer size - set by FRR package
